ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-5T Digital Camera Body (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 18-200mm LE Lens + <3> Sony 32GB SDHC Class 10 Card +
<4> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <5> Battery Charger + <6> 62mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter +
<7> Shutter Remote Control + <8> PD Mini Sling Backpack + <9> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-5T Digital Camera Body (Black) with E 18-200mm Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Charger + Backpack + Tripod + Accessory Kit
